about_the_game:
Determina is a fast-paced competitive card game where you control your fate.

There is no randomness: no card draw, no random cards, and no packs. Deep, tactical gameplay combined with fast, reactive counter-play means that the only thing that stands between you and victory is your opponent. Disintegrate foes, parry attacks, and counter spells in tense reactive card battles where every action is crucial.

Choose When To Strike

In Determina, you can respond to your opponent's actions immediately. Sudden commands can be played in response to your opponent's actions to act quickly before them, creating tense tactical gameplay. Wait until they drop their defences to defeat a wounded challenger or foil their plans by countering their powerful spells. But act too hastily and you may lose your lead.


Prove Your Skill

With absolutely no random elements, you are in complete control of your success. Build your perfect deck and react to your opponent to rise through the ranks quickly.
  • No card-draw means no more missing crucial top-decks and no more being flooded with unusable cards.
  • No random effects means no more losing to bad luck.
  • You choose which cards to start with, so you will always be able to predict your opponent and react to them perfectly.
Your fate is in your hands.

Play The Way You Want

Will you use the overwhelming might of the Ardentian Kingdom to cut-down your opponent? Or will you use the legendary spells of the Gildean Republic to disintegrate your foes? Combine any number of the six factions to create a unique deck and find your own playstyle. There is no restriction to what cards can be put in your deck and all cards can be unlocked freely and quickly, so you are only bound by your own imagination. Discover all the cards quickly just by playing online: you never need to spend a cent.

Play online with cross-platform multiplayer to prove your skill, test new decks online against friends, or learn the game offline against intelligent bots: you can truly play the way you want.

Play now for free on Steam, iOS, and Android, play Determina.
